task.title: How to Divide Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find steps showing how to use the division feature on the JPS calculator app

prereq.p: To successfully divide numbers, you must first understand the concept of division.

taskbody.result: The division result will be displayed.
taskbody.example: You want to divide the number 6 by 2. The equation will appear as 6 / 2 = 3. Enter the number 6. Press the division symbol (/). Enter 2. Then, press the equality symbol (=).The result will appear on the screen.
